name: Hot-Headed
text: Give to the Bobby Drake player. Forced Response: After you attach a Frostbite upgrade to an enemy, take 1 damage. Alter-Ego Response: After you make a basic recovery, discard this card.

flavor: "You think those ice sculptures can stop me?!"
name: Pyro
text:
Quickstrike.
[star] Pyro's attacks deal indirect damage.

name: Playing with Fire
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards the top 3 cards of their deck and takes 1 indirect damage for each resource icon discarded this way.

name: Pyro's Flamethrower
text: Attach to Pyro. Otherwise, this card gains surge. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Pyro attacks you, discard the top card of your deck. Pyro gets +1 ATK for this attack for each resource icon on that card.

name: Burn!
text:
When Revealed: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck (3 cards instead if Pyro is in play). Take 1 indirect damage for each resource icon discarded this way.
[star] Boost: Discard the top card of your deck. This card gets +1 boost icon ([boost]) for each resource icon on that card.

name: Sauron
text:
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Life Drain attachment and reveal it.
[star] Boost: Heal 3 damage from the activating enemy and give it a tough status card.

flavor: When Dr. Lykos absorbs mutant energy, he transforms into the terrifying Sauron!
name: Sauron Lives!
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches the encounter deck and discard pile for Sauron and deals him to themself as a facedown encounter card.

name: Life Drain
text: Attach to the minion with the highest printed hit points. It activates against you. If no minion activated this way, this card gains surge. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy attacks you, take 2 damage and give the attacking enemy a tough status card.

name: The Eye of Sauron
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck (top 3 cards instead if Sauron is in play). For each resource icon discarded this way, do the following: [energy] — Place 1 threat on the main scheme. [mental] — Discard 1 card from your hand. [physical] — Deal 1 damage to your identity. [wild] — Exhaust a character you control.
